title.narrative: Safeguarding and Improving Food Security and Nutrition through Emergency Agriculture Inputs Package and Multipurpose Cash Assistance

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to provide life-saving food security assistance to vulnerable communities affected by conflict and floods. This FAO project provides vegetable seeds and fertilizers to protect winter vegetable production and unrestricted multipurpose cash. The project provides life-saving assistance to 50,000 people, including 15,000 women, 14,000 men, 21,000 children, and 3,500 persons with disabilities.

participating-org.narrative: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)

owner-org.narrative: UN OCHA Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF)

organisation.narrative: UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA)

mailing-address.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA), Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF), 2 United Nations Plaza (DC2), East 44th street (13th floor), United Nations, New York, USA

description.narrative: Disbursement to CERF Project Safeguarding and Improving Food Security and Nutrition through Emergency Agriculture Inputs Package and Multipurpose Cash Assistance

receiver-org.narrative: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)

title.narrative: RESIDENT / HUMANITARIAN COORDINATOR REPORT ON THE USE OF CERF FUNDS MYANMAR RAPID RESPONSE DISPLACEMENT 2021

condition.narrative: CERF funding is based on an agreed proposal, including specific planned outcomes and outputs.

description.narrative: Agriculture livelihoods and food security of 10,000 vulnerable households and their family members restored and protected through the provision of vegetable seeds and fertilizers to support winter vegetable production.
AP.5a Number of affected people who state that they were able to access humanitarian assistance in a safe, accessible, accountable and participatory manner
Ag.1 Number of people benefiting from agricultural inputs (vegetable, pulses production package)
Number of people provided with quick awareness training and good agriculture practices and nutrition leaflets as part of the vegetable production package assistance
